about_the_game:
Engineering on the deepest level!


Kobold Underground Agency is a light hearted, family friendly 2d vehicle building game designed from the ground up to be played in couch coop.

The titular Kobolds have discovered a way into the underground but they are used to their cushy life in the above ground garden. There is only one solution! A highly skilled team of Kobolds will venture into the depths.

This team of only the toughest and most adventurous Kobolds will be led by you. As you explore the underground caves and help the first explorers reach deeper, Kobold society will develop and move deeper with you.

Perhaps this is the start of a new era in Kobold history?

Features:

Non-violent, Family friendly fun
Kobold Underground agency has zero violence, no weapons and no combat gameplay.

Hot join split screen
Bring a friend and explore together. Players can join and drop out at any moment. Work together on the same mission or each take on a separate one.

Forgiving gameplay
Kobold vehicles cannot be destroyed. Parts will not be destroyed. The player decides when they want to retry a mission, not the game.

Physics based flight
Positioning of thrusters and ship components affect the flight characteristics of your vehicle.

Krazy Kontraptions
Kobold rocketry technology is still in its infancy, so expect things to get weird. Stick to walls using Plungers, or Blast your way to success with the Hoppeneimer.

To boldly go, and shortly follow
As you explore, the less adventurous Kobolds will colonize the cave system. This brings many opportunities but has its own risks. Replay earlier missions but with new obstacles to prove your flight skills.
